title: Robot Utility Models: General Policies for Zero-Shot Deployment in New Environments
details: H Etukuru, N Naka, Z Hu, S Lee, J Mehu, A Edsinger… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Robot models, particularly those trained with large amounts of data, have recently shown a plethora of real-world manipulation and navigation capabilities. Several independent efforts have shown that given sufficient training data in an environment …
